articles.title: Bob Marley's grandson found dead at 31 - 1News
articles.description: Jamaican-American rising reggae star Joseph Mersa Marley was found unresponsive in a vehicle in the US.
articles.content:
Joseph Marley. (Source: Bang Showbiz)
Bob Marleys musician grandson has died aged 31.
Jamaican-American rising reggae star Joseph Mersa Marley was found unresponsive in a vehicle in the US on Tuesd… [+1500 chars]

articles.title: Bob Marley’s grandson, Jo Mersa, dies at 31 - Punch Newspapers
articles.description: Jamaican-American reggae artist Joseph Mersa-Marley died on Tuesday at the age of 31.
articles.content:
Jamaican-American reggae artist Joseph Mersa-Marley died on Tuesday at the age of 31.
The musician was found unresponsive in a vehicle in the United States on Tuesday, according to the streaming ser… [+1506 chars]

articles.author: Ankita Garg
articles.title: Putin confidante Dmitry Medvedev says Elon Musk will be president soon and US will have civil war in 2023 - India Today
articles.description: Former Russian President Dmitry Medvedev has made a wild 2023 prediction about Elon Musk, saying that he would be soon the president of the US and that America is headed for a civil war. Musk called predictions "epic".
articles.content: By Ankita Garg: Its that time of the year. As 2022 ends, everyone and their aunts are making some predictions for the new year. Now, former Russian president Dmitry Medvedev, who is also a very close… [+2514 chars]

articles.author: Brianna Holt
articles.title: Burning sage is more than just a TikTok trend, the practice has sacred Indigenous roots - Business Insider South Africa
articles.description: Until the 1978 passing of the American Indian Religious Freedom Act, Indigenous people in the US were banned from burning sage.
articles.content: Burning sage, also known as smudging, has become a popular trend in recent years amongst TikTok users, with hundreds of videos ranging from how-tos and casting away bad vibes to prayers and witch rit… [+3284 chars]
